DOC.brief_title: Comparison 12-day Reverse Hybrid Therapy 12-day Standard Triple Therapy Helicobacter Pylori Infection
DOC.detailed_description: For multicentre , single-blind , randomized-controlled trial ( REHYTRI study ) , investigator recruit patient H pylori infection . Using computer-generated randomization sequence , investigator randomly allocate patient either 12-day reverse hybrid therapy ( pantoprazole 40 mg , amoxicillin 1 g , clarithromycin 500 mg metronidazole 500 mg first 7 day , follow pantoprazole 40 mg , amoxicillin 1 g another 5 day ; drug give twice daily ) 12-day standard triple therapy ( pantoprazole 40 mg , clarithromycin 500 mg , amoxicillin 1 g 12 day ; drug give twice daily ) 1:1 ratio . Our primary outcome eradication rate intention-to-treat per-protocol analysis .
